[[Guy]] and [[Lee]] both activate the [[Eight Gates]], Guy entering the Seventh Gate and Lee the Sixth. After a streak of hits throwing the opponent up in the air, Lee uses the [[Reverse Lotus]] sending them down. Before they can reach the ground, Guy performs the [[Morning Peacock]] and the [[Daytime Tiger]], causing the tiger to consume the peacock's flames. Lee and Guy both rush through the combined jutsu, punching through their opponent, before the tiger explodes, spreading the peacock's flames.
